name: insulated gate bipolar transistor production, for electric vehicle applications | insulated gate bipolar transistor, electric vehicle application | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8700/documentation

This dataset describes the production of an insulated gate bipolar transistor (IGBT) used in the power electronics of electric vehicles. It is based on the direct inspection of a commercial device.

The dataset takes as input the various electronic components required to build the transistor and includes the components' production efforts. Assembly energy not included due to lack of data.

The dataset returns the assembled device and production waste as a by-product.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Direct inspection of a typical device of common technology.
